data.name: Genesis Plaza
data.desc: Decentraland Genesis Plaza

data.name: SUREAL District
data.desc: A district out of the boundaries of what you know as our physical world. Out of body experiences, magic, new laws of physics, mystical encounters, anything goes.

data.name: Dragon City
data.desc: A perfect combination of China’s ancient culture and Western modernization, a reflection of both the Eastern and Western civilizations.

data.name: AETHERIAN project
data.desc: Aetherian City will be one of the main attractions for visitors and dwellers of Decentraland, as it intends to be the largest cyberpunk-agglomeration of the metaverse.

data.name: Decentraland Museum
data.desc: Create the best place to showcase 2D, 3D and any sort of artwork in Decentraland.

data.name: Tech Sector: A Home for Developers
data.desc: Do you want to join meetups with other remote developers who are building parts of Decentraland, Blockchain Software and other technologies? Walk down the streets of the Tech Sector and something is bound to catch your eye

data.name: Anarchy
data.desc: Every LAND bought here must COMMIT to let anyone build whatever he wants in this land. We can add some anti-vandalism thing here later if necessary.

data.name: Star Kingdom
data.desc: A community in Decentraland for the micronation called the Star Kingdom.

data.name: DCL China City
data.desc: A district where Chinese people can get together to share culture, value and lauguage.

data.name: War Thunder Community Park
data.desc: The WT Park will be supported with developers and will become a VR museum of WWII vehicles with unsurpassed quality.

data.name: SF Zone - a home for science fiction fans
data.desc: SF-friendly district, with sub districts specific to the different subgenres of the genre, leaving enough space for subgenres we are not aware of but which exist or are going to exist.

data.name: Central Business District
data.desc: What better place to conduct your virtual business than the beautiful conference centers and office spaces of Decentraland's Central Business District?

data.name: Engineering Park
data.desc: An area where engineers can meet to discuss, explore, share and showcase ideas. These ideas could be related to the classical branches of engineering or to new branches and possibilities that nobody has even thought of yet.

data.name: Hacker City
data.desc: A place for developers to gather and build the earliest scripts and items that will be used in Decentraland.

data.name: Casino Featuring ETH Based Online Gambling
data.desc: A unique platform wherein the Casino has no edge but a 5% cut will be taken only from the winnings of participants

data.name: Central Marketplace
data.desc: Set up a central open-air marketplace where vendors can actively sell in-app goods

data.name: Democratic People's Republic of Yetepey
data.desc: This district will aim to work together and realize the goals of Supreme Leader Yetepey.

data.name: Embassy Town
data.desc: A district where other projects can have official embassies in Decentraland.

data.name: VARC - A District for All things Architecture
data.desc: VARC will be a district for Architectural professionals, students, hobbyists, and admirers. I envision this district having many roles and projects under four main categories: Presentation, Education, Design, and Commerce.

data.name: Festival Land
data.desc: This district is for people who want to make a Festival city in Decentraland.

data.name: Design Quarter
data.desc: Core hub for Modern Design and Visual Identity in VR. Center of Excellence for Virtual Arts from concept to completed construction.

data.name: Toke Social: A resort for cannabis connoisseurs
data.desc: An artistic style lounge for cannabis smokers to hang around, talk non-sense, and view the world from a different lens.

data.name: Star City
data.desc: Aims to establish a city with houses, businesses, community centers, casinos, shops, and so much more.

data.name: The Anarchist International (A-Squat)
data.desc: This district is a refuge for Anarchists to gather outside the Statist-Corporate systems they are battling against for the liberation of humankind.

data.name: MusicHub
data.desc: The district of musicians, fans, producers, and media. Come to listen to the latest tracks produced by residents, stay for live concerts.

data.name: Roads
data.desc: Decentraland roads connecting districts

data.name: Virtual Reality Shopping District
data.desc: VRS District bridges the gap between Decentraland, district0x and eCommerce store owners by acting as a resource to high-end businesses interested in creating their own Virtual Reality Shop.

data.name: Dragon Kingdom
data.desc: We are thinking of open a district called Dragon Kingdom where Chinese people can get together to share culture, value and language. but we also welcome people from all over the world.

data.name: The Whale Club
data.desc: Provide an exclusive area for MANA holders to relax

data.name: Fashion Street
data.desc: Bring top fashion brands (Gucci, Prada, Ralph Lauren etc.) in DCL. Each store will give DCL users a high sensory shopping experience.

data.name: Virtual Sand Hill Road
data.desc: In Silicon Valley, Sand Hill Road is notable for its concentration of venture capital companies.

data.name: Red Light District
data.desc: A "red-light district" within the Decentraland to help contain/manage/curate Adult services such as; Adult Live-chat, VR pornography, dating services and Adult themes e-stores.

data.name: Decentraland University
data.desc: Create the definitive centre of education in Decentraland.

data.name: Arena: a futuristic urban hotbed of creativity
data.desc: Arena is an urban community and hotbed of creativity. This is somewhere for like minded people to move forwards in VR as a loose creative collective.

data.name: The Chill Zone
data.desc: This will be a haven for all who wanna come chill. Features arcades, ping pong, board games, a stage, music, among others.

data.name: Shwedagon Pagoda
data.desc: Full size - beautiful Swedagon Pagoda - 100% replica of a real one

data.name: Decentramon
data.desc: You can use blank cards to go into the "wild" and capture Decentramon. Once captured, that decentremon is yours to keep, train, battle, use as a pet, or use however you wish.

data.name: Chobury - Democratic City for All
data.desc: Chobury is designed to be Democratic city that has social spaces, residential areas and commercial areas.

data.name: Freedom city
data.desc: All free people can cooperate freely. In the city of freedom, there is no unified management, unified planning, you have complete control of their own land.

data.name: E for EVERYONE
data.desc: EVERYONE, will be a no sale/no ads zone - a series of explorable sandboxes with limited goals, focused on open play.

data.name: Vegas City
data.desc: A digital sin city, party town gambling district of Decentraland. Designed in a style that emulates the Vegas strip, lies a long row of casinos, shopping, concert and performance halls, nightclubs, and sin.

data.name: Decentraland Conference Center
data.desc: A conference center in a natural, sylvan setting.

data.name: Greenpoint: A Meeting Point for Grassroots Movements
data.desc: The Movement aims at building an environment that thrives to create new opportunities for human collaboration, a meeting point to connect to at any time. Greenpoint is a place where people can meet, new organizations can be created, and existing organizations can connect.

data.name: Bitunia
data.desc: Bitunia is about Cryptocurrency, helping and teaching each other all about Bit- and Altcoins. Tech Analysis, informing each other about developments, spread the philosophy of decentralization, trading and so on.

data.name: Little India (Bharat)
data.desc: Many great cities of the world have a place called "Little India”, usually representing culture and traditions of India out of India. Same will be the purpose of our district: to showcase the great wonders of India, the culture, the festivals (Holi, Diwali, Pongal), among others.

data.name: innerGlitch - Science, Technology & Discovery
data.desc: innerGlitch is an educational project dedicated to the spreading of science literacy and general curiosity using different kinds of media. It will be a city-like layout with portions of LAND dedicated to particular topics, scientific conference rooms, interactive simulations, educational related activities, etc.

data.name: Bittrex Tomorrow
data.desc: There will be a skyscraper for each crypto exchange which lists MANA as a token, the height of the buildings will be updated each day with the total volume of MANA traded respective to the exchanges. The walls will plastered with info on each transaction which took place the previous day.

data.name: The Forest
data.desc: Just a bit of quiet, wild and beautiful nature in the crowded and noisy city.

data.name: The Battleground
data.desc: An Environment for PvP, RPG and RTS Gaming within Decentraland

data.name: Hunted District
data.desc: An area dedicated to what scares us the dark side of thing and anything related to horror. The town will host various genres and themes such as goar, ghost, zombies, cults, among other horror subjects.

data.name: Alvy Gardens
data.desc: Hanging Garden Styled District with a Pixel Art aesthetic

data.name: Fluffy DC
data.desc: Have you already dreamt about a world filled with extra cute kitties? We will make this dream a reality.

data.name: SciArt Lab
data.desc: Research and Development Lab for the open exploration of Science, Art and Technology.

data.name: Mother Russia Land
data.desc: First land for Russian community

data.name: Yoga Center
data.desc: Organize daily yoga classes in a quiet and relaxing environment.

data.name: NEO TOKYO
data.desc: This is a world where you can become Ninja! The idea is to bring back ninja into the future cybernetic world.

data.name: The Crypto Valley
data.desc: We introduce a virtual Crypto Valley to break up the geographic constraints and provide free access to anyone in the world. It is a large area dedicated to Crypto projects, either existing or upcoming ones.

data.name: Voltaire
data.desc: The virtual representation of the Voltaire House

data.name: EcoGames
data.desc: We have 3D artists and game developers from around the world who are ready to implement multiplayer mini games.

data.name: Amusement Park with Carnival Games
data.desc: An amusement park site in Decentraland, complete with rides, carnival games, gardens, and so on.
